data: There had been a thunder-shower in the middle of the afternoon, but it had passed away about five o’clock, accompanied by sullen rumbles and intermittent flashes of uncertain lightning.
There had been a thunder-shower in the middle of the afternoon, but it had passed away about five o'clock, accompanied by sullen rumbles and intermittent flashes of uncertain lightning.
